name: Deadly Silence
description: Welcome to Deadly Silence, the ultimate action game for people that enjoy action, gore and violence. The game puts you face to face with a huge array of challenges and situations as you face some unpredictable odds.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K @3.4 GHz / AMD FX-8350 @4.0 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
